item.title: WIP: Still figuring out HUGO
item.author: Author
item.description: This is a temporary page, since I am quite new to blogging with HUGO. I have been using Jekyll, but I am switching. Why? Well, it looks a bit too cumbersome. Security updates are sometimes not compatible with github-pages, I don’t like the current layout, I wanted a dark and white mode. I wanted a change. Let’s change, then. #tantecarecose
